title: Video From Pak Shared as ‘Muslims Flouting Norms in Hyderabad’
subtitle: Fact Check of People Shopping in Hyderabad: A video which shows a sea of people in a market place flouting social distancing norms is being shared on social media with a claim that the video is from India.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video which shows a sea of people in a market place flouting social distancing norms is being shared on social media with a claim that the video is from India. There are different claims with the message with one of them identifying the video from Hyderabad.

However, we found out that the video is not from Hyderabad but Pakistan.
